experiences.title: Software Engineer Consultant (Associate)

workDescription: Attained internal certifications of Spring Associate and Software Programmer, mastering software engineering principles, methodologies, and tools via rigorous training programs

experiences.title: Teaching Assistant
experiences.subtitle: UMN Department of Computer Science & Engineering
workDescription: Facilitated weekly interactive lab and office hour sessions, providing hands-on guidance to over 180 students in Python programming fundamentals, debugging, and problem-solving strategies
Assisted development of course materials like homework, lab write-ups, quizzes, exams to align with curriculum standards while ensuring clarity and cohesiveness for the learning experience
